column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------Â At 11 pm on January 20
column5: two people were hit by a train on the railway tracks in Khan Dangkor
column12: a construction worker was seriously injured.------Before the accident
column13: the man was drunk and his mother argued with him
column14: so he went to sleep on the tracks outside the house. A freight train from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville was coming
column15: and the old lady tried to get the man away
column16: but was hit and killed. The man was left seriously injured.------POST NEWS
